heading: HR00786
0: RESOLUTION TO URGE THE PHILHEALTH TO REVIEW ITS HEALTH CARE POLICIES RELATIVE TO BREAST CANCER AND INCLUDE BREAST CANCER STAGE IIIB AND ABOVE IN THE LIST OF DISEASES AND AILMENTS COVERED BY ITS HEALTHCARE PROGRAM, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF MAKING TREATMENT AVAILABLE TO ALL FILIPINOS SUFFERING FROM ANY STAGE OF BREAST CANCER, ESPECIALLY TO THE MARGINALIZED
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11215 enacted on 2019-02-14 Substituted by HB08636
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00786
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION TO URGE THE PHILHEALTH TO REVIEW ITS HEALTH CARE POLICIES RELATIVE TO BREAST CANCER AND INCLUDE BREAST CANCER STAGE IIIB AND ABOVE IN THE LIST OF DISEASES AND AILMENTS COVERED BY ITS HEALTHCARE PROGRAM, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF MAKING TREATMENT AVAILABLE TO ALL FILIPINOS SUFFERING FROM ANY STAGE OF BREAST CANCER, ESPECIALLY TO THE MARGINALIZED
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LANETE, SCOTT DAVIES S. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-14
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (078 2017-03-06)2. Silverio (005 2017-08-01)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
MOTHER BILL: HB08636
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2017-02-21
